tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    is_present BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
  attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  attendance_date DATE,
  attended BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE participation (
  participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  participation_date DATE,
  participation_grade FLOAT
);
